headline.main: PANZER UNITS SEEN AS NOT INVINCIBLE; Vulnerable if Opposed by a Trained, Properly Equipped Force, Officers Say

lead_paragraph: Mechanized Army units, such as the hard-hitting German panzer divisions, are not invincible if opposed by well trained, properly equipped troops. And discipline is indispensable to superiority in battle, it was declared here yesterday.
abstract: U S Army memos declare mechanized army units not invincible; discipline held indispensable to superiority
snippet: Mechanized Army units, such as the hard-hitting German panzer divisions, are not invincible if opposed by well trained, properly equipped troops. And discipline is indispensable to superiority in battle, it was declared here yesterday....
